outfit.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a set of clothes worn together, especially for a special occasion
outfit.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: She bought a new outfit for the party.
outfit.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a group of people who work together as a team or organization
outfit.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: My outfit was sent to Italy during the war.
a small advertising outfit in San Diego
outfit.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a set of equipment that you need for a particular purpose or job
outfit.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to provide someone or something with a set of clothes or equipment, especially ones that are needed for a particular purpose
outfit.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: a car outfitted with dual controls for driver training
Members outfit themselves in Civil War clothing.
outfit.translation[2].definitions[0].def: a small company or organization, especially one that not many people know about
outfit.translation[2].definitions[0].exa: These outfits are solo lawyers or small law firms that advertise themselves as experts.
outfit.translation[3].definitions[0].def: to prepare a vehicle, building, piece of equipment etc for a particular purpose
outfit.translation[3].definitions[0].exa: The company won an order to outfit a new medical center.
The group has outfitted its delivery trucks with computers.
